name: Black Jack: The Dark Dealer
description:
MoonJam 2022 version of Black Jack: The Dark Dealer, but fixed the bug with the Bingo board not properly completing.

Q: Why can't I buy potions?

A: You're not hurt... yet.

Q: Is there a win condition?

A: Yes but it will probably take a while to get to and needs some luck. Might be a little more lenient with the bingo board bug being fixed though.

Q: When does the dealer stop taking cards?

A: hits till 5 under I think? I dunno I'd have to look at the code and it's a mess :)

Song is - Phantasm by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4209-phantasm

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
